law.catch_line: Refund of assessment collected from producer.
law.text: In the event the referendum is carried in the affirmative and the assessment is levied and collected as provided, any producer upon and against whom such assessment shall have been levied and collected under the provisions of KRS 247.610 to 247.685, if dissatisfied with said assessment and the result thereof, shall have the right to demand of and receive from the treasurer of said certified association a refund of such assessment so collected from such producer; provided, such demand for refund is made in writing within thirty (30) days from the date on which said assessment is collected from such producer.
